title: The Orchid Cried
content: The orchid cried because there was no rain. The One thought the orchid is crying there is no rain. The orchid is not cut out for this. Why are you doing this sun? Let it rain. Let the orchid feel wetness, comfort, and the love of the raindrops.  Goes to show who has the light heart. The One has the lightest heart. It weighs less than a feather. The feather can help measure how good One is. And in the world of the orchid, a heart light as a feather is all she needs.
